transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji Sanjay ji.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji Sanjay ji main abhi call back kar rahi hu aapko ek minute main call pe hu bas abhi kar rahi hu. 
Customer: Phone to aapko ek ghanta ho gaya uske baad mein abhi bhi thodi aap phone par.
Executive: Sir mera discussion hua na abhi sir se main abhi call pe hu main karti hu aapko call mujhe bas do minute dijiye.
Customer: Mere unko unko bolo ki mere ko phone kare number do unko main baat karta hu unse.
Executive: Haan ji sir main karwa rahi hu baat rukiye abhi ek minute.
Customer:
summary:
\n
Concerns:\n
- Delay in callback despite waiting for an hour.\n
- Request to speak directly with the executive's superior.\n
\n
Resolution:\n
- Assurance of immediate callback in two minutes.\n
- Offer to connect the customer with the executive's superior.\n
\n
Next Steps: \n
Issue not resolved.\n
\n
Alert (If Any):\n
None\n
@@@Sentiment:\n
Frustrated to assertive.\n
\n
@@@Key Topics:\n
callback, delay, superior
\n
\n
